item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (48 points | 24 comments)
2. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (147 points | 27 comments)
3. Can SpaceX land a rocket with 1/2 cm accuracy? (45 points | 31 comments)
4. IOCCC Flight Simulator (2010) (84 points | 12 comments)
5. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (203 points | 20 comments)
6. Scientists working to decode birdsong (63 points | 59 comments)
7. Waking up science's sleeping beauties (2023) (19 points | 7 comments)
8. Plankton balloon to six times size in newly discovered mode of oceanic travel (35 points | 3 comments)
9. "The Secret History of the Mongols": A digital history approach (20 points | 7 comments)
10. Morsle – A daily Morse code challenge (14 points | 7 comments)
11. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring a Full Stack Engineer (React/Mongo/Node) ( | hide)
12. Turning the Crank: Design as a Mechanical Process (11 points | discuss)
13. A step toward fully 3D-printed active electronics (157 points | 68 comments)
14. Show HN: HN Update – Hourly news broadcast of top HN stories (530 points | 162 comments)
15. Making Castro’s Feeds Update Faster the Lazy Way (69 points | 18 comments)
16. Brain endurance training improves older adults' cognitive, physical performance (25 points | 4 comments)
17. Do AI detectors work? Students face false cheating accusations (323 points | 697 comments)
18. Show HN: Semantic Macros Text Editor (21 points | 4 comments)
19. WebGPU-Based WiFi Simulator (300 points | 79 comments)
20. Is it better to fail spectacularly? (81 points | 79 comments)
21. Intelsat 33e breaks up in geostationary orbit (121 points | 93 comments)
22. Kurt Vonnegut's lost board game published (294 points | 83 comments)
23. Drasi: Microsoft's open source data processing platform for event-driven systems (298 points | 51 comments)
24. Extinction of the Influenza B Yamagata line during the Covid pandemic (25 points | 3 comments)
25. Show HN: Erin – Open-source and self-hosted TikTok feed for your own videos (96 points | 41 comments)
26. Sabotage evaluations for frontier models (41 points | 1 comment)
27. Sampling with SQL (159 points | 33 comments)
28. My free book "Rust Projects – Write a Redis Clone" is out (54 points | 26 comments)
29. C-Motive's electrostatic motors use printed circuit boards instead of magnets (109 points | 47 comments)
30. The Ultimate Conditional Syntax (127 points | 38 comments)
